title: Spacious updated Ardmore single home is ready for you to move in!
description: Spacious updated Ardmore single home is ready for you to move in! This home features many upgrades; rebuilt front porch, 2021, New furnace and central air 2020, a waterproofed basement 2021, new sewer line 2022 and a beautiful new three-piece bath 2022. The entire inside of the house has been just painted and the hardwood floors have been refinished. The recently updated kitchen has a new sink and faucet, new range hood and newer SS appliances. The covered front porch leads to an entry hall with a coat closet. Walk into the bright Living room and Dining room with a shallow bay wall for extra space. Then enter the roomy kitchen with butcher block countertops, new flooring, and light. The kitchen back door gives access to the level rear yard. The basement has a side exit and a separate space that could be used as a wine cellar. The second floor features a main bedroom with two large closets, two more bedrooms and a new full bathroom. The full basement has a sump pump, radon remediation system, and laundry with a newer washer and dryer. The backyard is fenced and the exterior of the house was painted in 2022. The paver patio has room for a party. Come enjoy this very walkable location with a walking score of 73. Did I mention Carlinos is a block away! All within walking distance of public transportation, parks, shops, dining, and it's in the award-winning Haverford School District.

title: 2 Bedroom Townhouse
description:
Charming 2 bedroom, 1 bath home in the desirable Graduate Hospital neighborhood. This south-facing abode features an open living room, dining room and kitchen, with plenty of natural sunlight, wood flooring, and a kitchen with island, granite counters, and dishwasher. The bedrooms are large and sunlit, and the rear offers a built-in desk area. Stylish bathroom features blue glass tiles, white vanity and quartz countertops. Light-reflective roof, wood flooring, modern furnace and water heater, and high efficiency HVAC. The washer and dryer are in the unfinished basement, which offers storage.
This wonderful home is nestled in a fantastic location, convenient to many hot spots including Ultimo coffee, City Fitness, The Sidecar Bar & Grill, plus Penn’s campus. Ten-minute walk to Rittenhouse square and Twenty-minute walk to the Hospital of the University of Pennsylvania.
Rear of property is on Clymer.
Available June 1, 2023
Rent: $2,400 per month. Utilities (i.e., cable, gas, and electric) paid by tenant. $30.00 per month surcharge for pets. One-month deposit.
A video tour is available on YouTube: https://youtu.be/Wg94Q1QLnXc

title: Perfectly sized, gorgeous 2 bed, 2 bath condo in Old City!
description:
Perfectly sized, gorgeous 2 bed, 2 bath condo in Old City’s Historic Bank Building. This unit is one of 17 luxury apartments with a doorperson and direct access to the fantastic amenities at the neighboring Renaissance Hotel including the gorgeous pool, fitness and business centers, and discounts on food, beverages, and hotel rooms. Light-filled open concept living and dining space with hardwood floors throughout and a custom-built seating nook. Top-of-the-line kitchen with ample storage space, subzero refrigerator, Mielé appliances, and a long island for great counter space and seating. title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. description:
Rarely available Society Hill town house for rent! Spacious four bedrooms, ideal for those that may need that private home office space! This home is ideally situated in Society Hill and walking distance to restaurants, shopping, coffee houses and grocery stores, Enjoy pulling directly into your own parking spot in front of your home, no more driving around for that elusive parking spot three blocks away! The third floor features two bedrooms, one of which is en-suite, and the other which contains the new Samsung side-by-side washer and dryer. The top level has the homes other two bedrooms and the second full bathroom in the middle of both. title: very affordable efficiency studio in University City
description:
Cozy and bright efficiency studio(for one occupant) in the heart of University City with a kitchenette and bathroom with a stand up shower. Rent includes Water, Heat, and Electricity.  This efficiency studio is located in a very quiet, clean, and residential street; conveniently minutes away from University of Penn, Drexel University, the Restaurant School, University of the Sciences, VA Hospital, CHOP, HUP, and Penn Presbyterian Hospital with easy access to public transportation. SEPTA bus routes, trolleys, and the EL are all a couple of blocks away from the property.
It is also in close proximity to many trendy and culturally diverse restaurants and cafes such as Saad’s, Jezabel’s Cafe, Renata’s Kitchen, Loco Pez, Aksum Cafe, Vientiane Cafe, Pho&Cafe Saigon, Clarksville, Dock Street Brewery, Dottie’s Doughnuts, etc., Spruce Hill is literally minutes away via vehicle from the nightlife, the superb shopping experience, the high class dinning/small mamas and papas hidden gems, and the spectacular arts and culture that Center City offers. The area is patrolled by Penn, Drexel, Philadelphia Police, and the University City District for your sense of security and safety.  There is no laundry in the premise, but laundromats are a couple of blocks away.
Minimum ONE year lease.  First month, Last month, and one month security deposit must be paid in full prior to move in.  A $50 non-refundable application fee for credit and background check.  Application process  may take up to 10 days to complete. Please contact only if you are seriously interested.

description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton

record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.
